title: Tax Girlfriend
description: 25-year-old Kuzayama Hiroshi could no longer endure the workplace abuse and the harsh words of his superiors. Unable to cope, he quit his job and became a homebody. However, one day, a beautiful woman named Takahashi Ai appeared, claiming to represent the Tokyo Metropolitan Government. She offered him a chance to join the [Youth Rehab Project]. If he accepted, the government would provide him with financial support, his type of girl, and mental support...
author: Heidi
